channel.title: Comments on: Second Hand Computers Criticism
channel.description: I am multiple and various - Tomas A. Krag

item.title: By: AMAN SINGHAL
item.dc:creator: AMAN SINGHAL
item.description:
Hello Sir/ Madam
I am Aman Singhal From India Company Name Doll International , we are interested in buying all these products just let us know what is the best price you can quote us as i am ready to take all these in bulk quantity and want to be there for the long run business deal with you so we want some assistance from your side that is we want help from you about the product knowledge. I want to know that what type of computers you can give us as u mentioned that u are dealing in
monitors
laptops
computer parts
whole systems
and etc
So can u please let me know that which monitors are there
what are the laptops which company , what is the configuration are in that
what all are the computer parts u are dealing in
and what is the configuration of the whole system means is the pc P4 with 2.4 Ghz wha is the size of hard disk and ram ? how mach and what is the warrenty structure and what is the duty charged from there to INDIA and all the benifits you can provie us . thanx
waiting for your earliest reply, aman singhal D-28, kamla nagar India +91-11-33054263 keaton_mdolla@yahoo.com aman_singhal1712@yahoo.com
